Reviews.Title: Fantastic deal! Best price onthe internet!!
Reviews.Author: pmhavoc
Reviews.Content: GREAT!! These are high quality connectors and very reasonably priced. I recommend these to everyone! They are perfect for camera to monitor cables that need adapters, like I need them for!

Reviews.Title: What can  say? These adaptors came on time and work as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Sr.
Reviews.Content: Good product at a really good price. I got these for my cameras and attatched them to my dvr and they work perfectly. They arrived quickly. I would definately recommend these. :-)

Reviews.Title: Great product, fast service!
Reviews.Author: Brett Maternowski "maternowski.us"
Reviews.Content: These work as promised. No video loss. They are thin but are tough. For the price I could not be happier! [...]
